Welcome to Durrant Heaven

Durrant’s Haven is an NGO that seeks to provide dynamic solutions to difficulties faced by the vulnerable children in the society, specifically street children and orphans

Mission Statement

Our mission is to save lives of children, promote children’s rights through child care, education, and healthcare.

Vision Statement

To be a country where children’s rights are celebrated and protected.

Values

- To give a better future to children
- To Educate
- To Protect
- To give them a home of love and life

Causes

Children to get their home

To Educate and Protect them

To give a better future to the children

About Durrant Heaven

What We Do

We aim to give a better home to the children in order to build and gain their full potential as humans.This happens through our three core programmes: Recovery- rescuing, Rehabilitation- repairing, Reintegration- preparing

Networks

We network with civil society organisations from around the world working together to ensure that children grow up safe and are given the full protection within families. We advocate for good child protection policies and services, we share good practices and innovation, and we continuously learn from each other to improve the way we work to bring smiles on the faces of the children.

Who we are

We are a team committed by protecting the rights of children and giving them a better life. We have a safe home where we give the needed assistance to needy children. About 15 dedicated staff members who work in protecting the children.

Partners

We partner with Giving Hope Foundation, Mobile Web Ghana and others to assist influence governments and institutions to make the necessary changes in order to help promote healthy rights for children.

Latest From News

About Us

Durrant’s Haven is a non-governmental organization in Ghana protecting children’s rights and focusing on vulnerable victims both locally and internationally. Founded by Patience Durrant in 20----. Our main efforts focus on addressing issues relating to children especially street children and orphans.The DH will be providing services in a form of excellence care to the vulnerable children to be housed at the center.
